alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 21 at 4:15AM MST until February 21 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued for portions of the area from 11 AM through 6 PM Tuesday afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 233 AND 237... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 233 and 237. * Timing...11 AM MST until 6 PM MST on Tuesday. * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 12 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Eastern Las Animas County Including Pinon Canyon
